type.description: The namespace and ID of the desired [Power Type](../types/power_types.md).

name.description: The display name of the power.

hidden.description: If set to true, this power will not be displayed in the power list of the origin.

condition.description: If set, this power will only be active when the player with this power fulfills the condition.

loading_priority.description: Specifies when this power is loaded. Higher numbers mean it's loaded later, which means it will override those with lower loading priorities which share the same ID.

badges.description: If set, it will display icon(s) after the name of the power.
